name: Siren Shoals
description: Dangerous underwater areas inhabited by sirens create deadly maritime hazards with potential magical rewards. The siren songs can lure ships to their doom, while the magical nature can provide opportunities for those who can resist the enchantment.
atmosphere: Haunting melodies drift from hidden underwater caves while sirens use their songs to lure ships onto the rocks. Scattered wreckage marks previous victims as enchanting voices promise impossible desires. Beautiful but deadly inhabitants make these waters treacherous. Resist the song or join the bones on the seafloor.
